mapper.update: update t_approval_process set process_name = #{processName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_type = #{processType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where process_id = #{processId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select process_id, process_name, process_type, group_id, remarks, create_time from t_approval_process
